page.title: 14Recreation in Hartlepool
page.content: {3. What can children do?} There are parks, pleasure gardens and other open spaces, some containing swings and agility apparatus for children of all ages in different residential areas of the town. The swimming baths has an Olympic size diving area as well as a very shallow toddlers pool. Youth Clubs and discos are available for social activities for older children. Energetic children can learn gymnastics, badminton and Karate by joining clubs especially for these sports. Many churches have uniformed organisations e.g. Boys Brigade, Guides and Scouts and their junior sections. {4. Are there any nature walks? }There are no nature walks laid out to follow but walking through public parks provides glimpses of nature as does the beach.
